items.text: fuller on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: angling across him, ends up on off, driven to deep cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: loses control of this one, full toss outside off, punched with force through extra cover, but Tamim runs around and slides to stop a boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: tickled fine. Bad ball on the pads and all Hope had to do was get a little bit of bat on it, which he does and finds an easy boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: round the wicket, angled into him, worked to midwicket with soft hands, soft enough to take a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller on off, defended tentatively, but it takes the inside edge to roll towards square leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball spinning into him, he stays in his crease and pats it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: good length, a bit quicker, he stays in his crease and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and he whips it from there to long-on's right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: flighted on the stumps, he comes forward and turns it around the corner for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flays this from outside off but there is a deep cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length ball, goes back in his crease and punches it past the diving bowler to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length but angling into him and ends up on the pads from around the wickets, and easy one to tuck to square leg of his hips
items.postText: Zaman: "Do you agree to bring Fizz for his second spell at this stage when both the spinners straggled W Indies? Could try Mahmudullah after Shakib's quota"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: very full, clipped gently to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, he takes a big stride out and drives - but straight to cover
items.postText: Drizzle seems to have abated for now
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: full again, and driven fluently once again. Mis-field by mid-off lets the ball through - Mehidy again - and they get a couple
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 2 runs

items.text: good length outside off, steered to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: on the pads again and he clips it off his pads past short fine leg, who hares after the ball to keep them to two
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, floated up, driven but cover fields by tumbling to his left
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, no run

items.text: fooled him with the dip, he was taking a big stride out but didn't reach the pitch of the ball, finally manages to bunt it past the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, he goes back and across and punches, but Mehidy goes full stretch to his right to field the ball
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: quicker one, similar line outside off and pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: given some air, but no turn. On a good length though outside off, and pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: finally manages to place his push beyond the bowler's reach by moving across and creating the angle to send the ball to long-on for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run
